title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 October 2013 - XWiki

10:44 <vmassol> hmm seems I have some clirr issues now, fixing  
10:46 <vmassol> hmm strange  
10:47 <vmassol> I have put: <exclude>org/xwiki/url/\*</exclude>  
10:47 <vmassol> ah maybe missing a star  
10:48 <vmassol> I know  
10:49 <vmassol> I completely remove XWikientityURL and XWIkiURL.. need to put them back

11:27 <mflorea> thanks to you! ;)  
11:28 <tmortagne> is it only me of github is not feeling well ?  
11:28 <tmortagne> (talking about ssh, did not tried the UI)  
11:29 <vmassol> indeed  
11:29 <vmassol> I committed several minutes ago  
11:29 <vmassol> and still didn't get the notification here

11:50 <tmortagne> back

11:56 <gdelhumeau> \*git

11:59 <tmortagne> (I had to force the build in jenkins)

14:32 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:10 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
15:11 <fmancinelli> Hi guys, so you know a way to make maven copy also hidden file in resource folder? I have a src/test/resources that contains some dot-files/dot-directories that don't get copied.  
15:14 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
15:17 <vmassol> fmancinelli: did you check the doc for the resources plugin http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-resources-plugin/ ?  
15:19 <vmassol> found this for you: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13659410/maven-resources-plugin-copy-hidden-test-resources  
15:19 <ldubost> has quit  
15:20 <fmancinelli> yep, already seen that and also the resources plugin, but still no clue. mvn install from the command line only copies non-dot-files  
15:21 <vmassol> you could check the resource plugin mojo source code  
15:21 <fmancinelli> yep, I'll do  
15:21 <fmancinelli> thanks  
15:27 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
15:30 <fmancinelli> has quit  
15:37 <ldubost> has quit  
16:09 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:35 <vmassol> guys do you think I should merge this commit for 5.2 too? Seems slightly dangerous to me but I'm open  
16:40 <tmortagne> vmassol: yes sounds a bit dangerous, it's like that since a very long time now so it does not have to be in 5.2  
16:40 <vmassol> ok  
16:48 <vmassol> mflorea: you're releasing tomorrow?  
16:48 <mflorea> yes, tomorrow early morning  
16:48 <vmassol> guys: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-5.2.x/14/  
16:49 <vmassol> gdelhumeau and tmortagne  
16:49 <vmassol> we need 5.2 to be extra stable  
16:49 <vmassol> (didn't check the problem)  
16:50 <vmassol> I'd say it's a bit dangerous to commit stuff for 5.2 now, wdyt?  
16:50 <vmassol> (should wait for 5.2.1 IMO)  
16:50 <tmortagne> I seen the error but I don't see what this error has to do with Guillaume'e commit:  
16:50 <tmortagne> symbol  : class CacheConfiguration location: class com.xpn.xwiki.XWiki  
16:50 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: The only problem is IDEA has cleaned some import  
16:50 <vmassol> the only known problem you mean ;)  
16:50 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: maybe you don't know the rule? The rule is that if you break then release because of a last moment commit then you become the defacto RM for the next bugfix version 1 or 2 days after ;)  
16:53 <tmortagne> the release was not really supposed to be today because of the BFD  
16:53 <vmassol> right, it was yesrtday ;)  
16:55 <gdelhumeau> I'm doing a new PR to fix the import issue  
17:03 <fmancinelli> has quit  
17:03 <tmortagne> vmassol: note that IDEA removed the import because you forgot to remove useless imports after your refactoring  
17:04 <vmassol> what refactoring? the url one?  
17:07 <tmortagne> your new branch about wiki descriptor  
17:07 <tmortagne> the cache of wiki in XWiki class bacame useless  
17:07 <tmortagne> became  
17:09 <vmassol> note that there are still improvements to bring to the XWiki class  
17:10 <tmortagne> vmassol: like removing it ? :)  
17:10 <vmassol> :)  
17:10 <vmassol> like the removal of  XWiki.virtualWikiList field
